Each time you try your best, you'll have a chance to get one step closer to your dream. Each action you take will impact the continuation of the story. So, what kind of choices will you make?

name: Puff Town
summary: This is a casual board game that requires walking by rolling dice with the goal of reaching the finish line when the catnip runs out.

name: P.U.R.G.A.T.O.R.Y
summary: Welcome to P.U.R.G.A.T.O.R.Y! Experimental dark comedy sandbox time killer. Judge souls upon their arrival in death, do they deserve heaven, hell or the grinder, that is entirely up to you.

name: Push Blox
summary: Block-pushing puzzle game with challenging high quality levels.

name: Purrfection! The Cat Tossing Game!!
summary: PURRfection, the cat tossing game! is a room-scale mini-game VR-only experience where players take on the role of a reckless cat factory worker tasked with sorting the cats into their correct bins before your 75 second shift ends.

name: Puzzle Pests
summary:
Puzzle Pests is a fiendishly addictive bug-based puzzle game. The aim of Puzzle Pests is simple - clear all the fleas off the game board by blowing them up, sending them through trap doors or matching four fleas of the same color in a straight line or a square formation. But beware! New fleas are being born all the time so you have to keep up with the population growth. Puzzle Pests is packed with puzzles and challenges to keep you coming back for more. Have you got what it takes to beat the pesky fleas?
Hours and hours of insect fun. With three different game modes and cartoon-style graphics, you’ll never get tired of playing Puzzle Pests. Solve 100 puzzle levels, see if you can deal with increasingly more difficult levels in the Round Robin mode or test your mettle under time pressure.

name: Pumped BMX Flow
summary: Flow through endless jumps, pull off insane stunts, and compete in Daily Leaderboards to be the best in the world.

name: Puzzle 9
summary: Puzzle 9 can surely train your brain and increase your memory power with its 9 unique puzzle games. Improve your thinking and decision skills while having fun, for much less than one dollar a game!

name: Putt Putt Golf HD
summary: The official Putt Putt Golf game! The legendry name in mini-golf with over 90 holes of putting fun! You don’t have to play golf to love Putt Putt mini golf, it’s a fun experience for all with the fantastically fun courses in the beautiful levels of: Fantasy Lane, Roman Road, Arctic Lands, Pirate Paradise and Jungle fever. Watch out for the water! And the giant moving snail or that strange rotating cakes! Inspired from the miniature golf putting courses from the famous Putt Putt Golf capturing all the skill and fun to make the game truly enjoyable. Do well and you might even get a medal!

name: Putt Putt Golf 3D
summary: You don’t have to play golf to love Putt Putt mini golf, it’s a fun experience for all with the fantastically fun courses in the beautiful levels of: Fantasy Lane, Roman Road, Arctic Lands, Pirate Paradise and Jungle fever.

name: PureSkate 2
summary: When you play PureSkate 2, you are the skater, using your fingers and your device to catch air and perform tricks you never thought possible. Watch and feel as your skater reacts to each and every push, ollie, bump, tilt, and grind you perform.

name: Puzzle Art: Snakes
summary: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with snakes. The player's goal - puzzle pieces together to get a beautiful picture.

name: Puzzle Art: Birds
summary: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with birds. The player's goal - puzzle pieces together to get a beautiful picture.

name: Push-Cars
summary: With a brand new game idea, Push-Cars will have you hooked with its irresistible gameplay. You only have to use one finger to position the cars in the desired direction and hit PLAY to make them move and clear each level. Easy to play, but with a smooth difficulty curve that will keep you craving for more! There is more than one way to resolve each level, but only one will give you the three wheels of fame!

name: Pui Pui Molcar Let's! Molcar Party!
summary:
Welcome to a brand-new town, Moltown! Only you and the Molcars can transform this barren burg into a bustling urban hub. And with that...let's party!

With 10 exciting minigames, that is! What's more, sharing Joy-Con controllers allows for up to 4 players at once.

Play alone or with friends—the wide world of Molcars beckons you!

Minigames: An exciting array of minigames awaits! Includes scenes from the show!

Step into the Molcar world with a medley of fun minigames spanning all genres! Throw a party, dance, even play soccer—cops and robbers too!

name: Pumpkin Slasher
summary: Slash Pumpkins until you die !

name: Puzzle Sigma
summary: Play as mathematical operators and build equations to solve puzzles

name: Pugovki
summary: Game-pack includes six entertainment logical games: "Lines", "Corners", "Reverses", "Click-mania", "Four in a row" and "Three buttons". Novel and colorful patchwork graphics and pleasant music will bring you into the bright world having so little with household chores and drab existence. Each game has three levels of complexity and includes a detailed guide.

name: Pulse
summary: Horizontally smooth-scrolling shoot-'em-up for the Commodore VIC-20.

name: Puri-Puri
summary: Can you be Puri's babysitter?

name: Puzzl9
summary: A randomly-generated puzzle game

name: Push Puzzle: Rescue Adventure
summary: Push and move objects to save animals and build a new rescue center.

name: Puzzle League
summary:
Puzzle League (also known as Panel de Pon Multiboot) has been released with several Panel de Pon games. It was first released on February 7, 2003 in the Nintendo Puzzle Collection alongside Panel de Pon (GCN). This game would later get released internationally in English under the localized Puzzle League name in the GBA compilation Dr. Mario & Puzzle League alongside Dr. Mario.

This the only Panel de Pon fairy aesthetic game to be officially translated in English (Since Panel de Pon (SFC) was not translated in the Nintendo Switch Online release as it simply reuses the Japanese ROM), albeit with it's title screen replaced. The game features Pupuri, the Flower Fairy Mascot who makes an appearance in both this game and Panel de Pon (Nintendo Puzzle Collection).

name: Pump
summary: A PUMPKIN WITH A BAT

name: Pumpkin Invasion
summary: A top down 3D shooter game, your objective is kill as many pumpkin heads as possible and survive the waves by collecting meds/cash for upgrades and candies (Its halloween after all)

name: Purrfect Apawcalypse: Invert Frontier!
summary: This is the PA series second Fan-game!

name: Puzzled Love
summary: Puzzled Love is a a point-and-click-and-drag-and-drop game where you will cover pictures with other pictures to uncover the love story layer by layer. Meet Jonathan and Lily, the two troubled hearts who have just moved into a new apartment to start a life together—a life that is full of new hopes and beginnings. Or is it?

name: Puzzlezon
summary: Grid-based logic game where your goal is to get to the end of each level. Manage all the obstacles on your way to make a path. Push cardboxes, rotate racks and fill holes with boxes.

name: Purify
summary: "Purify" is a 2D action RPG game in which a cleaning robot aims to reach the deepest part of a closed underground laboratory. Become the cleaning robot "Zero" and engage in tense battles with robots that have gone out of control.

name: PunchMan Online
summary: PunchMan is an online game designed for everyone who wants to enjoy their free time doing something funny. Whether you're good or bad at gaming, whether you're a grown adult or child, your gender, your job doesn't matter. All you need to do is punch and punch.

name: Pumpkin Eater
summary: Family is family.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 13
summary: Season 13 will introduce a series of updates to the recently released Taego map, which is set in 1980s South Korea. Chief among these updates is the introduction of the Taego Secret Room, which will randomly spawn on the map and contains some of the best gear Survivors can find. However, players will have to discover a secret key before they can access the Secret Room!

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 14
summary:
First up in this Season is the ability to pick up and carry a downed survivor. You can now throw them over your shoulders and bring them with you to victory.

Next up, Taego has received a lot of changes. Additional covers are added in some areas, and the terrain has also received improvements. Furthermore, Breakable Pots have items inside so break and loot! Error Space are special new zones marked on the map that can spawn items featured in other Battlegrounds, so make sure to check the map for locations.

In addition, Taego and Paramo have been added to the Ranked. The rulesets have also been changed accordingly, so check out the details below. Many changes have been made to Erangel’s hot place Pochinki, along with the Pony Coupe and Porter, Halloween decor and weather on Erangel, the new Trick-or-Treat Progressive M416, and more.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 15
summary: Season 15 comes to you with a map service update, a new vehicle (the mountain bike). balance and world updates, as well as some Christmas themed fun!

name: Purity
summary: Protect your fragile heart from the infectious impurities!

name: Purge Persist and Profit
summary: Kill alien bugs for corporate gain!

name: Public Access TV: Superstar!
summary: A simulation game about hitting it big on public access TV.

name: Puzzle Inlay
summary: Puzzle Inlay is a logical tiling puzzle game where the player has to fill in unique shapes with available blocks

name: Puzzle Juggle Trouble
summary:
A stacking puzzle game where you get two increasingly terrible pieces at once.

In this game, just like in regular Tetris, pieces fall from the sky. Unlike regular Tetris however, you are given multiple pieces at once, and you can swap between controlling one or another at any given time. You clear blocks by either making solid lines, or by filling square regions of at least 5 blocks by 5 blocks. The former increases the speed of the blocks' fall, the latter makes you move on to more and more complex pieces.

Try Arcade mode to see how far you go and push for higher scores, or race in Time Trial to set record times! You can also play Arcade mode in local Co-op between a keyboard player and a controller player, or have a custom game of Arcade mode where you can change various settings, from what pieces you get to how many at once are falling or even the size of the board.

name: Purple
summary: A short puzzlescript game about changing the colour of blocks

name: Puzzle Series Vol. 12: Akari
summary: Puzzle Series Vol. 12: Akari is a Puzzle game published by Hudson Soft released on March 8, 2007 for the Nintendo DS.

name: Pumpkin Curse
summary: Destroy monsters, buy new heads and have fun!

name: Punch Pong
summary: Ping pong meets street brawler

name: Pullto
summary: Challenging mouse maze and puzzle hybrid

name: Puzzlebot
summary: A simple Simon says puzzle game. Remember all the move combinatios while creating some cool beats.

name: Puppertrator
summary: You've been accused of a crime you didn't commit, also you're a dog.

name: Puff and the Catnip Caper
summary: A short and silly game about cats solving crime.

name: PurgaStory
summary: Multiple-player hide and seek game

name: Putrid Shark
summary: A game by Carly Besterman featuring an original chiptune soundtrack by Putrid Shark (the band). Putrid Shark was a joke gone too far made on a 3-week deadline.

name: Pullywog
summary: Leap to the Top in a challenging platformer that follows the journey of a small frog on a big adventure. The goal is simple: climb to the top of the world! But the journey is far from easy. Do you have what it takes to make the leap to the top?

name: Pure Chase 80's
summary: One of the most exciting Nintendo Switch chase games! PC80's is pure arcade, pure speed, pure adrenaline. Frantic driving, with no time to even blink.

name: Puck Bash
summary: Experience the frenzy of Air Hockey pushed to its extremes as the puck reaches lighting speeds.

name: Puzzle Frenzy
summary:
Puzzle Frenzy is a compilation game where you play 6 different casual puzzle games.
*Color Connect
*Pipes
*Word Connect
*Block Escape
*Luminous Loops
*Move the Ball

name: Puzzle Box
summary: A cute little indiegame where the goal is to go through all the levels and reach the cake, but be quick! The crow might get the before you, and maybe you have to shapeshift into something different to be quicker.

name: PuppetShow: Fatal Mistake
summary: Can you stop a new monster brought to life before it's too late?

name: Pure Mini Golf
summary: Enjoy over 50 unique levels, each with its own set of obstacles, twists, and turns. Its simple controls make it a snap to learn from the outset and through its three modes, you’ll soon go from fledgling to master putter. Arcade mode takes you through the game’s levels where you can play at your own pace. Once you’re feeling more confident in your skills, you can take on Challenge mode where failing at any time takes you back to the beginning. And when you’re done playing alone, you can bring in up to three friends for some Local Multiplayer and chill. The putting life is a simple one. Bring it into your home with Pure Mini Golf.

name: Punchman
summary: Punchman is a simple 1 versus 1 fighting platforming game featuring a set of different characters, power-ups, and levels.

name: Puzzmagic
summary:
The 80's are back and we love it!
The puzzle game to top all puzzle games, Puzzmagic! A game of fiendish perplexity and diabolical puzzles, Puzzmagic is set to take the world by storm! Just drag to position the blocks and make them dissapear. Sounds easy?
Puzzmagic is a one-player game that is simple in execution and yet amazingly difficult to master. Addictive gameplay as you have never imagined. If you liked Puzznic gameplay, you'll love Puzzmagic.

name: Puff Go
summary:
PuffGo is an on-chain multiplayer royale game that allows players to earn while having fun. The game contains several level themes and gameplay modes that offer players a choice of matchups from solo to multiplayer. Players can collect game characters with different appearances, personalities, abilities, and costumes. Players can also use different characters to participate in various levels of games and modes based on the advantages of each. Multiple skills and strategies matter when you compete with each other for higher ranking and better rewards.
The game aims to allow players to operate various game characters, and provide players with an intriguing and differentiated game experience by trying out diverse themes and levels with varied costumes. We have multiple main characters with distinguishable personalities and nonidentical appearances, each with their own story and customized skills or attributes that play to their strengths in different application scenarios. The team dreams of building an NFT gameverse where players are saturated with entertainment and rewarding experience

name: Purry Furry Adventurry
summary: Help Kat escape from her loving owner in this cute little endless runner!

name: Push the Box
summary: The game is a puzzle with boxes, will you be able to solve the puzzle.

name: Putty Putter
summary: A grid-based movement golf game where you control a putty-like creature with the unique ability to expand and form different shapes. Do you have what it takes to stretch your brain power to the limit and conquer all mind-bending puzzles on offer?

name: Puzzle Battler! Mirai
summary: "Puzzle Battler! Mirai" is a fun 4-match Puzzle RPG with a variety of skills to attack and defend. Chain the puzzle pieces to defeat the enemies, get funny skills and challenge the bosses!

name: Pushy Worm
summary: Help daddy worm as he embarks on a puzzle filled adventure to gather fruit for his hungry little family. Solve puzzles using grid-based Sokoban movement, climb fences, balance items on your head, avoid falling on to spikes, do whatever it takes to collect all the fruit and keep those kids happy.

name: Pure Logic
summary: Explore logic symbols. Discover the rules. Solve complex puzzles. Conquer all zones. Feel the power of your logical side!

name: Puzzle Art: Primates
summary: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with primates.

name: Pusheep
summary: Pusheep is a very simple yet challenging puzzle game about planning your moves to achieve one clear goal, removing all evil sheep from your beautiful floating islands.

name: Pump King
summary: Wield the incredible power of the shot-leg to blast your way out of an unforgiving and seemingly endless chasm. Or screw up and send yourself tumbling back down to the bottom - it’s up to you.

name: Punched
summary: Your fists speak louder then your words! In this crazy F2P beat 'em up game use all the power you can get to absolutely obliterate the competition!

name: Puzzles For Clef
summary: Puzzles for Clef is a relaxing adventure game focused on the eponymous heroine. Following a letter from her sister, Cres, our bunny friend Clef journeys to the island of her ancestors, to undertake a treasure hunt.. The journey will take her across a land of beauty, magic, and mystery, as she explores each of the island’s regions, solves its countless puzzles, unearths long-forgotten secrets, and rediscovers her family’s legacy.

name: Purge: Three vs Blood
summary: PURGE - THREE VS BLOOD presents an exciting arena-style zombie apocalypse. Battle ravenous zombie waves with up to 3 players, unlock ranks, maps, unique characters, and a variety of weapons and traps.

name: Puckoff
summary: Expect epic hockey fights, beautiful goals and cheap shots, lots of cheap shots. These unique moments you can find only in PuckOFF. Single/Multiplayer campaign, variety of ways to score goals or knock people out and a full 4-player split screen co-op. Puck the rules.

name: Puzzle Art: Horses
summary: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with horses.

name: Puzzle Art: Rodents
summary: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with rodents.

name: Puzzle Art: Predators
summary: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with predators.

name: Puzzle Art: Artiodactyls
summary: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with artiodactyls.

name: Pumpkins
summary: Pumpkins is a Halloween themed arcade style puzzle game. Traverse through a set of pumpkin patch mazes while avoiding pests and collecting pumpkins.

name: Punch-Out!!
summary:
Punch-Out!! is an enhanced port of the Wii game under the same name) released only in China for the Nvidia Shield console. It was part of a batch of Nintendo games released for the console in a collaboration of Nintendo and Nvidia, in 1080p and with gameplay adapted to work without the need of motion controls.

All of the Nintendo games released in this deal ran on special versions of the emulator Dolphin, which made possible all of the changes applied.

name: Puzzle & Dragons Nintendo Switch Edition
summary: Embark on an epic quest, harnessing the power of appealing monsters and clever puzzle play! Featuring three modes jam-packed with Orb-matching fun: Quest, Player-versus-Player, and Custom!

name: Punch It Deluxe
summary: Relax, De-stress, and unwind your day in this simple and violent arcade game. Release your rage while the relief washes over you as you PUNCH, PULL, and TWIST your enemies (who, let's face it, probably deserved it).

name: Push Ops
summary: PushOps is a roguelike with a twist: There are no weapons! As a player, you must manipulate physics objects to survive. Fast moving blocks will deal damage.

name: Puputan Legend VR
summary: Puputan Legend VR Patih Kebo Iwa - is a custom multiplayer online battle arena game. Inspired by the history of the archipelago, this game has a puputan war theme with the icon Patih Kebo Iwa, the hero from Bali.

name: Putridness
summary: A harsh virtual reality zombie shooter with realistic mechanics, extremely dangerous enemies, liters of blood and dismemberment. This is not the place for beginners and casuals.

name: Puss In Boots
summary: The DS port of Puss In Boots, a game based on the movie with the same name.

name: Punji VR
summary: Inspired by classic tactical shooters of the late 90's and early 00's, PunjiVR was designed from the ground up to bring that feel to modern technology. This is not just "another VR shooter" or a tech demo. The jungle wants you dead, will you give in?

name: Puppeteers
summary: PUPPETEERS is a first person, action packed co-op horror game. Experience a terrifying campaign by yourself, or partner up with up to 4 players in a cooperative horror adventure. Run. Hide. But try not to scream, it might hear you.

name: Pusher
summary: Pusher is a box-world or sokoban type game. Fight your way through a mixture of 50 levels, ever increasing in difficulty. The goal of the game is to push boxes around until they are all in the designated positions, but this is easier said than done.

name: Push the Sheep
summary: A puzzle game where you have to push the sheep to make each one graze.

name: Punch Kidd
summary: Punch Kidd lets you re-live your favourite game as a kid, complete with frantic air punches, ghostly enemies and miracle puzzles. Master a world of 16 epic, challenging and diverse levels.

name: PureSkate
summary:
The long awaited update to one of the first 3D Skate games for iOS is NOW available.
Get ready to skate your heart out in the most realistic and intuitive skateboarding simulation ever made!
Natural fingerboard control combined with a rich 3D view of your skater's
world creates a fun and addictive skateboarding experience that is the first of it's kind.

name: Pure Pool Snooker Bundle
summary:
Get ready for the most authentic billiards experience you've ever witnessed from the comfort of your couch!
Whether you prefer to spend your time refining your Pool skills or weighing up against the competition in an online Snooker game, take your best shot and prepare to be blown away.

This bundle includes the Pure Pool base game + the Snooker pack.

name: Purpose: Versus
summary: An upcoming action RPG which takes place simultaneous to the story of Purpose: VERSA; its counterpart story in the Purpose timeline.

name: Puzzlewood Quests Premium
summary: A role-playing, brain training game where you fight enemies by solving as many puzzles as you can before the enemy attacks!

name: Puzzle: Nature
summary: Puzzle: Nature - cute, colorful puzzle game. Your goal is to put the pieces of the puzzle together to make a complete, beautiful picture.

name: Puzzle Mix
summary: We offer you a puzzle game. The meaning of the game is to make a mosaic pattern that needs to be folded from many fragments of different shapes. This game will arouse the greatest interest among art lovers, as it presents paintings.

name: Punihi Loader
summary: The 12th release in the franchise, 221Games Punity series is single player, Mech custom & Third person shooter.

name: Puk
summary:
Puk is a fast paced pure action puzzler requiring skill dexterity, nerve and endurance. Pull back and ping to obliterate targets in 1000 unique, quick-fire levels that are endlessly generated and different every time.

Aim straight, aim fast, clear the screen and prepare for the next. Complete as many screens as you can in a single run; challenge your friends and use integrated game center scores to keep an eye on who's currently on top.

name: Puzzle Freak
summary: Roll the dice and land on a puzzle challenge. Complete it and advance to beat the other players/AI.

name: Puzzle Putt
summary: Shaun's off to play a relaxing round of mini golf, but there's a problem... the course is littered with obstacles and it looks like those unruly pigs have been digging up the greens! Help Shaun crack the course by solving fiendish puzzles and building creative constructions to beat the holes. Can you complete all 8 courses and finish under par?

name: Puzzle Game Bundle
summary: A bundle of puzzle games for the whole family! Contains the classic game Among Pipes, the relaxing Fall Gummies and the game Zoo Dentist that will teach kids to treat their pets with love and care, while at the same time protect their own teeth!

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 16
summary: Season 16 includes weapon balancing, a trip back to the smugglers' isle, a new ranked season and more!

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 17
summary: A new weapon, the return to Sanhok's former glory, new items hitting ranked games and more in Season 17 of PUBG: Battlegrounds!

name: Puppet Boss
summary:
"Good morning, ma'am. Let me escort you to your office."

I thought I walked into my office, but what am I doing in this pervert house?!

Four people with unusual fetishes that appeared in front of me, who became the figurehead of a men's clothing company.

I did ""it"" tonight, then the next day,... then in the night again. Are we really allowed to do this all day?

name: Purple War
summary:
Purple War is a classic RTS game that supports up to 8 online multiplayers.
Players gather resources to build base and troops, and take down enemy with various tactics and strategies.
The game is fast-paceed, intuitive and easy to learn.

name: PuffPals: Island Skies
summary: A wholesome life simulator game where you can collect, farm, customize and explore new lands with cute and fluffy PuffPals!

name: Puyo Puyo
summary: The LCD version of Puyo Puyo is an handheld game developed by Handheld Ltd.. It was distributed first by Epoch in 2006 as part of the EL-SPIRITS Retro series, and resaled by Hashy Top-In in 2008 as part of the Pocket Boy Series.

name: Puyolin
summary: A Puyo Puyo licensed game by Tiger Electronics.

name: Puddink
summary: Puddink is a relaxing physics puzzle game in which your goal is to stack blocks of pudding to reach the flag!

name: Puzzle Mino
summary: Puzzle Mino is a minimalist puzzle game. As a puzzle solver, you need to use the blocks to fill in the empty parts of the puzzle panel. With this core gameplay, I has designed about 10 unique mechanisms and a total of about 100 hand-crafted puzzles.

name: Put Your Brain On
summary: Put yor Brain On it`s a game about thinking...in which you are a farmer and you have to plant the harvest before the sun go down. Hurry up !

name: Pure Crosswords
summary: Enjoy 2,250 puzzles across 3 difficulty levels, and written in classic British English. The clues are shown right in the puzzle grid, making crossword puzzles easy to view and play.

name: Puzzledrome
summary: Make every row and column a palindrome in as few moves as possible! Challenge your mind with a game that takes thought, agility, and creative thinking to solve unique palindrome puzzles. Swap the tiles until all of the rows and columns are palindromes, in as few moves as possible. Inspired by symmetry, Sudoku and matching games, Puzzledrome takes tiled based puzzling to the next level! What's left is right, what's up is down…

name: Push Out
summary: Grab your friends and make a journey to the magic islands with mysterious inhabitants. They can't solve who's the best: Mr. Crab or Vulcano, Mrs. Bird or Mr. Whale? Help them! And you can do it by yourself or with friends - there could be two, three or four players on screen at once!

name: Puffi
summary: An LCD game based on The Smurfs franchise. This version was released in Italy by Virca in 1983.

name: Purrate Adventure: Volcano Isle
summary: Explore, Platform & Plunder a large Volcanic Isle in search of Coins, Gems, Crowns, and the 5 hidden talismans!

name: Pure Farming 2018: Germany Map
summary: Expand Pure Farming 2018 with the Germany Map for hours of additional gameplay. Run a new farm located in one of the most beautiful parts of Germany and try your hand at unique, region-specific activities: growing rapeseed and raising sheep!

name: Punk Wars: Threat From Within
summary: Threat from Within DLC brings two new game modes to the world of Punk Wars!Take control over a small squad of units and try to survive as long as you can in a competitive survival mode. Or embark on a journey of betrayal and retribution in a brand new, story-oriented Atompunk solo campaign!

name: Pure Hold 'Em World Poker Championships
summary: Play Your Cards Right!Pure Hold’em World Poker Championshipcombines stunning visuals

name: Puzzle Collection
summary: Amazing jigsaw puzzle collection with 40 beautiful puzzles in your hands or TV for everyone! Enjoy hours of gameplay with cosy pictures and relaxing music.

name: Pumpkin Story
summary: Within the country of Sunderlin there is a Cute Spooky Story, nikkis pumpkin story with your best pal asuka to guide you a game of wonder and excitement, you can go through dungeons with puzzles, secrets and a collection of music notes! fighting brooms with bombs, lanterns, fireflies and magic!

name: Puppetmaker
summary: A 3D first Person Horror Game which takes place in an old dusty house. You are trapped in the house together with an old mysterious Puppetmaker. The key is to be as silent as possible and escape the house by solving puzzles with logic, without being caught by him. Everything you do or move could be heard by the Puppetmaker, so be aware!

name: Puchi Nikki
summary: Puchi Nikki is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame made in SmileBoom's Puchicon app (otherwise known as Petit Computer in other regions) for DSi. Players take the role of an unnamed person with long black hair and white clothes, who starts off in a Japanese style room and is able to leave it to enter the Nexus. There is no in-game text to be found, with everything menu-wise being represented by icons.

name: Punk-o-Matic 2
summary: The ultimate music game! Create awesome punk-rock-metal music build your career!!

name: PulpCraft
summary: 2D Minecraft for the Playdate made with Pulp

name: Pulpmon
summary: ​Pulpmon is small turn-based monster fighting game for Playdate!

name: Pumpkin head
summary: This game is a side-scrolling 2D action shooting game created with dot pictures. Control the main character, Pumpkin Head, as he runs through various stages such as the sea and the desert while battling the slime army!

name: Put Pud Nudli's Adventure
summary: Become a hero who saves the island of cats. Explore these varied areas of this island. Fight Chef The Cat’s creatures and after that face the meowing horror. The game is hard, but if you can give it time, you will become better and better.

name: Purgatory Dungeoneer
summary: A roguelite RPG about plundering a psychic hellmaw for personal closure, and the resources to build a town beyond the grave. Become the mayor of a supernatural medieval village. Recruit over 400 former adventurers to plunder the hellmaw for resources, and unlock the buried memories of your companions. Use these resources to improve the village, and the capabilities of your citizens. And strive to keep a personal touch as the village grows beyond your expectations.

name: Puzzle World: Cute Monsters
summary: Welcome to the game "Puzzle world - cute monsters". Here you will find exciting conundrums in the form of puzzles. You have to combine many different fragments together, while creating a whole picture. Dive into the fascinating world of cute monsters! Don't stop at one - collect them all!

name: Pussy 5
summary: "Pussy 5" is a hentai puzzle in which you need to move the elements vertically or horizontally to get the finished image.

name: Puzzle Bundle: Inbento & Golf Peaks
Puzzles with Nature
summary: In this game, you will find a huge variety of relaxing puzzles designed to train your brain. Start dragging the puzzle pieces to the right place until you form a whole picture.

name: PumPum: +5 Girls Pack
summary: This DLC adds 5 more girls to the game!

name: Purrrfect Love
summary: Sometimes she's naughty and sometimes she's cute... sometimes she's sexy and enthralling to boot. Create your own story of true, throbbing love... A beautiful, visual novel of love... straight from the soul. You're just dying to get those heartstrings plucked, aren't you?

name: Pulpergeist
summary:
An unmarked letter appears on your desk. A boy has gone missing.

With work having dried up, you decide to take on the case. What you'll soon discover however is a mystery far more ghoulish than you could have imagined.

Pulpergeist is a classic point-and-click adventure game made for Playdate with Pulp. Solve puzzles, escape dangerous traps and enemies, and work to uncover the truth behind the missing child.

Share Meow Grams of cute and funny kitten pics with your friends. If you like kittens you'll love Purr Pals Purrfection. 10 mini-games have 3 levels of achievement in each game. name: Puzzle Club
summary:
Puzzle Club is a cancelled puzzle arcade game developed by Namco in 1990. While it never has received any form of official release, the game's prototype ROM was dumped and is playable in emulators.

The game is very akin to slide puzzles, however the player must link the matching tiles into a horizontal row, as opposed to completing an image. Once a row has been completed, the blocks will turn to bricks, and cannot be moved. Two modes are present in the game - "Pacman Story" and "Floor Exercise" - with Pac-Man only appearing in the former.

Pacman Story features the Pac-Land incarnations of various characters, fully animated, as the tilepieces. Upon completing a level it shows an intermission, featuring a zoomed-in Pac-Man character that is identical to the regular tile(s). After thirty levels, the game ends, displaying the credits. The Floor Exercise mode is incomplete and impossible to finish; instead of Pac-Man tiles, it features generic slot machine graphics. In place of Pacman Story's intermissions, Floor Exercise also has bonus rounds, featuring a large puzzle of a girl lifting weights.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W: Sudoku
summary: Sudoku is a puzzle in which you place numbers from 1 to 9 into a 9x9 grid, divided into horizontal and vertical lines and 3x3 blocks, filling up all of the spaces with the numbers. With everything from simple puzzles to super-difficult ones, this game is popular with a wide range of players, from beginners to veterans. Please enjoy this high-quality sudoku game.

name: Pub Games
summary:
Pub games is a themed compilation of seven games that have been popular in public houses (drinking establishments) in the United Kingdom for decades. This package is aimed at young teens with the inlay card containing words like 'Here's your chance to find out what it's like in those smoke-filled haunts of adulthood'. All the games are two player games of the 'hot seat' variety - with the exception of Table Football where both players have their own action keys The games can be played either as a 'Full Pub Games Run' - which takes the player(s) through all the games and will take around two hours to complete, or a practice mode which allows the player(s) to select and games in any order.

Scoring in each game is self explanatory but in the 'Full Pub Games Run' players win £1 per game so the winner at the end of the run is the one with the most money.

The games are split on both sides of the cassette Side 1 - Menu, Darts, Bar Billiards, and Dominoes Side 2 - Table Football, Pontoon, Poker, and Skittles

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Akari
summary:
This famous and easily understandable puzzle was created in 2001.
"Akari" is a puzzle in which you set lights based on the hint numbers in order to light up the entirety of the white space. The main features of "Akari" are the easy to understand rules, and the depth of the game. There are great numbers of patterns for which you will figure out "When the numbers and lights and spaces are combined like this, then THIS is how they are sure to match up", so you have plenty of opportunities to taste "the excitement of discovering new patterns".

As a Human you must steal Andre Toulon's secrets of reanimation and escape with your life. As the Puppets must protect your Master’s secret at all cost! The greatest attraction is the fact that there exist an unlimited number of set sequences known as "theorems". With this puzzle, you can actually feel your own skill level rising with each theorem you learn.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Akari
summary: This famous and easily understandable puzzle was created in 2001. "Akari" is a puzzle in which you set lights based on the hint numbers in order to light up the entirety of the white space. The main features of "Akari" are the easy to understand rules, and the depth of the game. There are great numbers of patterns for which you will figure out "When the numbers and lights and spaces are combined like this, then this is how they are sure to match up", so you have plenty of opportunities to taste "the excitement of discovering new patterns".

name: Pussy: Love Story from Titanic
summary:
Pussy: Love Story from Titanic is a single player game which contains platform and falling brick puzzle solving elements. Gameplay is similar to the game Popils.

The story behind the game is that Leonardo won a ticket to travel on the Titanic's maiden voyage. There he met the girl of his dreams, Kate. However Kate was rich and Leonardo was poor and worse, a thief. Their love was forbidden.

The game consists of a series of fifty puzzles in which the objective is to get Kate & Leonardo to meet. Kate is usually on top of a parapet or trapped behind a wall shouting 'Help' and the player must guide Leonardo to her. To solve these puzzles Leonardo can climb ladders and, with his mighty fist, he can smash bricks. Smashed bricks disappear and the bricks above them will fall down to take their place. Some bricks are hollow and cannot be smashed, others will explode.

The game also features teleports, which the manual assures were a common feature on the original Titanic, enemies to deal with, and two lengthy platform sequences where Leonardo must traverse the length of the Titanic.

Passwords are used to enable games to be restarted at later levels.

summary: In this super popular puzzle, black spaces and white spaces slowly come together to show their true form. "Nurikabe" is a puzzle in which you refer to the arranged numbers to fill in all of the spaces. It's popular with a wide range of players, from beginners to experts. It feels great watching the black spaces stretch out like a soft-bodied animal.

summary:
"Pure White Chord" is a card development mobile game in the two-dimensional magic world. It uses the world famous opera works as the background to create a unique and fantastic adventure story.
Players act as the "conductor" who symbolizes the dance drama of the orchestra, leading various characters from classic works, and embarking on a journey together to find the clues of the "Great Movement of Creation" that leads the fate of the pure white world.
In "Pure White Chord", the process of breaking through levels will no longer be just boring repetitive homework. With the levels designed with RogueLike as the core, every adventure will be a brand new experience.

name: Puzzle Swap
summary: Puzzle Swap is a game in which players aim to complete a 3D animated picture of a Nintendo video game by gathering its pieces. If a player encountered on StreetPass possesses any pieces the player does not have, the player can choose one of their pieces to add to their own. The player may also use Play Coins to buy random pieces for their existing panels, although it won't always be a new piece. After the December 2011 update, new puzzles became available which included four or eight pink squares in the center. Pink pieces are distributed to players via SpotPass and can only be gathered via StreetPass; they cannot be bought using Play Coins. Some puzzles have more pieces than others, making them harder to complete.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Heyawake
summary: This is a progressive puzzle which you can comfortably enjoy working out using logic. "Heyawake" is a puzzle in which you fill in the spaces according to the rules. It's called "heyawake" ("split rooms") because the face of the board is divided into rooms. This puzzle first appeared in 1992, but a plethora of solutions have been developed, allowing for a very progressive puzzle. Each time you discover a new strategic move, your skills of solution will improve.

Little Hades has kidnapped the Puzzle Gods, and Little Zu is the only one who can save them. Join Little Zu in his quest to rescue his friends!

Our heroes Aary, Fizzi, Garin, and Skuik find themselves locked in a hidden lab where their wonderful and mysterious adventure is about to begin.
Engage in a dynamic and colorful puzzle game, use special techniques and abilities, like gravity distortion, to clear all bubbles. Help our heroes solve the secrets of the delicious fruit juice and reveal the real purpose of the Big Machine.
Get challenged in an amazing world of over 150 handcrafted levels giving you the chance to extend your smart play with the use of the unique Super Sonic Bubble Powers. Extraordinary laboratory environments, heroes with special super powers, lots of sweet colorful bubbles full of delicious and mysterious fruit juice.
