name: Puppyman
summary: New critters are introduced as the player progresses, with Pork N Bean making an appearance in higher levels. The player will overcome each enemy using a different tactic including jumping, waiting or running. Touching an enemy causes Puppyman to lose bones and reduce the overall score for the level. Some enemies will chase Puppyman causing him to miss collecting his treasures. Avoid the critters, save Pork N Bean, and collect all bounty to achieve the highest possible score.

name: PunPics
summary:
PunPics is a guess-the-picture game with a twist–it’s all puns. Use that squishy brain of yours to solve a growing collection of visual pun puzzles and riddles.
Test your wits against our punny mind benders, brain teasers, and visual rebus puzzles.

name: Puzzle Bobble 2X/Bust-A-Move 2: Arcade Edition & Puzzle Bobble 3/Bust-A-Move 3: S-Tribute
summary: Enjoy new features in Puzzle Bobble 2X and Puzzle Bobble 3, games where you shoot bubbles that pop when 3 or more of the same color stick together.

name: Pusu: Uyanış
summary: Pusu:Uyanış is the first 3D action game of its kind in Turkey.

name: Put Your Brain on 2
summary: Put Your Brain On 2 is a casual-puzzle game about thinking and organizing tactics.

name: Push Push Cat
summary:
Push the blocks and make a way to save the cute cats who have lost their homes!!
Push Push Cat is a classic sliding puzzle game that anyone can easily learn and enjoy.
You can adopt cute homeless cats in various themes and customize them and shoot selfies.

You can meet many famous cats from around the world to empathize and heal.
Cats who are more affectionate than their stomachs, please come and pet them now!

name: Puzzles & Conquest
summary:
The once glorious Saurland was fallen under the Undead Army's attack.
Darkness and flames follow their path of carnage; their reign of terror devoured all hope.
The dead were brought back to life, and the horrific legion expands.
The whole continent is on the brink of destruction.
Humans, Elves, Dwarves, and all the other races laid aside their differences to form an alliance for their survival.
Yet, they await an extraordinary leader to take charge against the army of evil.

name: PumpKin Majo
summary: Our pumpkin witch tries to avoid hitting the evil pumpkins and stay away from other enemies while collecting green orbs and trying to reach the highest score on halloween. So it takes a lot of effort to make the highest score on halloween.

name: Puzzling Wild IQ Test
summary: Puzzling Wild introduces this IQ Test of logic and visual reasoning. These IQ Tests were developed by a Professor to try to test the intelligence of AI robots. Can you solve all 400 by your self? The puzzles are introduced by our good friends Ginger the Giraffe, and Hugo Hippo.

name: Pure Gore
summary: Pure Gore is a 2D physics action sandbox & people playground simulation, where you can build your own world.You can create or use pre-built vehicles, machinery, rockets, bombs and most importantly mutilate melons (fruit) with one of the over 100 elements. Its a steam port!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Hashiwokakero
summary: "Hashiwokakero" is a puzzle in which the numbers resemble islands, through which you draw lines resembling bridges. You have to take the entire board into consideration while progressing piece by piece. You do need to pay attention for this puzzle, but it can be solved smoothly and nicely.

name: Pueblo
summary: A small topdown shooter in pixelart graphics.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Hashiwokakero
summary: Draw as many connecting lines as indicated by the numbers in the circles.

name: Puzzle Pieces 4: Farewell Dear Winter
summary: With this Jigsaw gameplay and dazzling collection of puzzles, the beauty never stops. The pictures are a mix of beautiful winter and spring scenes. There are a lot of options to choose, from puzzle shape and number of pieces. You will love to use your own images and create puzzles from them.

name: Pucca Puzzle Adventure
summary: Puzzle RPG Adventure with Lovely Pucca! 3 years ago, the cosmic villain Dong King led his army to the Earth. Dong King began to distribute low-quality food that can control the people's minds. People who consumed Dong King's food soon became mindless minions of Dong King. Dong King's army reached Suga Island, Pucca's home.

name: Purple War: Extra Mission Pack 1 - Prelude of War
summary: Veiled stories of two factions Elf and Orc, their stories will finally be revealed. This DLC contains 5 missions of Elf and 5 missions of Orc.

name: Putridum Horror
summary: Putridum - Psychological dark horror in which the player will have to explore a large dark hous with only a weak flashlight, look for the right things, not be caught and find a way to escape from there.

name: Punt
summary: In Punt, gravity is at your fingertips -- discover the abilities of the E.M.M.A. in this new and innovative first-person puzzle platformer running on the Source Engine!

name: Puzzle Cats
summary:
Drag and drop cats onto the puzzle board and try to make them all fit! The unique puzzle shapes and ever-evolving challenge will train your brain to think in a whole new way. With every puzzle you solve, the challenge will grow. Can you fit all the cats?
Collect cute new cats as you beat each puzzle challenge to customize your game!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Masyu
summary: You won't use any letters or numbers in this original puzzle - the only hints are black circles and white circles. "Masyu" is a puzzle in which you draw a line through the spaces according to the rules. Learn the attributes of the black and white circles and you'll be able to play in no time. The patterns through which lines can be drawn are more numerous than you can imagine, and discovering tactical moves is also fun.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Masyu
summary: Nikoli's original puzzle using only black and white circles for hints.

name: Puzzle Together: Animals Jigsaw Super Pack
summary: Unlock 277 puzzles depicting wild, lovable, and crazy animals! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends. In addition to unlocking 277 unique puzzles (a $34.97 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Puzzle Together: Architecture Jigsaw Super Pack
summary: Unlock 185 puzzles depicting buildings and landmarks! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 185 unique puzzles (a $32.97 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Puzzle Together: Great Paintings Jigsaw Super Pack
summary: Unlock 508 puzzles depicting great paintings! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 508 unique puzzles (a $76.94 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Push the Button to Win!
summary: you just have to push the button

name: Pug Rapids
summary:
Hot diggity dog, your pug is ready to ride in this game of rapid reflexes!
Tap left or right to guide your pooch along a fast-flowing river. Collect boatloads of coins, but don't hit the riverbank, or your pug's joyride is over.

name: Pudding Chess
summary: Pudding Chess is the cute apple chess game in Pudding Series.

name: Putt-Putt's Fun House
summary: Putt-Putt's Fun House is a series of interactive fun learning activities for kids ages 4-7 years. Each activity offers a progressive learning curve with puzzles from easy to challenging.

name: Pumpkin Delivery
summary: After carving her own pumpkin, Murphy decides to give it to her grandmother and goes out on Halloween night without her parents for the first time. Thus begins her fight against the Halloween evil that has come to life in the city.

name: Putt Golf
summary: Play the ultimate fun Putt Golf game. The game is very simple, you just have to judge the angle of the ground and tap at the right time to putt the ball.

name: Puym: Lake
summary: Click on the skate, aim at the garbage can and manage to throw away a minimum of masks to reach the goal ! It's up to you to solve each riddle! All around the lake, visit 100 emblematic places and discover their stories. You will also learn a lot about the decomposition of waste in nature.

name: Pump It Up Fiesta
summary: Pump It Up is a music video game series developed and published by Andamiro, a Korean arcade game producer.

name: Pump It Up Fiesta EX
summary: Pump It Up is a music video game series developed and published by Andamiro, a Korean arcade game producer.

name: Punk-o-Matic
summary:
Punk-o-Matic is a music sandbox flash game developed by Evil-Dog and released on January 26, 2004.

Although Flash was discontinued on January 12 2021, Punk-o-Matic is still playable through BlueMaxima’s Flashpoint as well as The Newgrounds Player.

name: Puzzle Wizards
summary: Puzzle Wizards is a cozy co-op puzzle MMO from the creators of Puzzle Pirates (2003). Create your wizard and join a magical world of puzzling wizardry! Harvest, craft and battle by playing three respective puzzles, where you own skill makes the difference to your results. Join co-op adventures in the wilds and defeat nefarious spirits and worse to gather resources and loot, then return to your cozy Wizard village and guild to decorate, craft, socialize and make the world a better place.

name: Puzzle Panic Island
summary: Puzzle Panic Island is a fast paced, skill-based match 3 Puzzle Platformer. You Control a character who must survive the Puzzle Blocks falling on their head and then Match them up, while also avoiding the Hazards they carry within! (Mostly Dinosaurs.)

name: Push-Up T-Rex
summary:
This is the story of Felix the T-Rex.
Since he hatched from the egg, he has dreamed of being the first T-Rex doing Push-Ups.
Together you’ll discover the coolest cities of Planet Earth.
The more weights you collect on your journey, the longer the tiny little T-Rex arms will grow.

name: Puzzlepops! Plus
summary: A challenging, brain-bending game of logic that mixes a traditional sliding puzzle with the art of candy making. Slide pieces of candy along lollipop sticks and combine them to complete each Pop! Plan your moves carefully and use tricky contraptions to freeze, melt, squash and swap candy.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Shikaku
summary: "Shikaku" is one of Nikoli's own original casse-tête, with simple rules and a unique feeling of solution. Until you get used to it, you'll tend to solve the casse-tête with guesswork, but the real charm lies in solving them with logic. Once you master the method of solving the casse-tête by gradually stretching squares from the numbers, you'll be able to enjoy "Shikaku" on an even deeper level.

name: Puppetmaster: Pose Viewer
summary: The Puppetmaster Pose-Viewer is the next, new 3DX innovation from the team that brought you Sensual Adventures! This PC-only software application will let you watch and play with Brittany, Trinity, Jasmine, Marcia, Livia and Alexandra in almost any way you like.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Shikaku
summary:
Divide the grid into rectangles
in this remarkably satisfying puzzle.

name: Pudding Bubble
summary: Pudding Bubble is bubble shoot game with cute pudding graphic.

name: Pudding Bang 2
summary: A new style of Whack-A-Mole Game with Cute Puddings. Puddings are trying to break out from mobile. Please stop them!

name: Puzzle Pop
summary: Move the tiles to pop the bubbles.

name: Puncherman!: First Day
summary: Puncherman!: First Day is a first-person comedy physics dad simulator where you play as a retired FPS hero/generally manly man trying to become the best dad ever. One problem: the only way he can interact with the world is with an incredible punch. Use your fists of fury to prove your heart of gold!

name: Puzzle Party VR
summary: Multiplayer puzzles in virtual reality.

name: Pushman
summary: A puzzle game about a little astronaut fellow who pushes blocks. Released in 1990 by Sammy Corporation, and developed by Comad Industry.

name: Puzzled Runner
summary: Endless flight in space. Letters fly past you. Your goal is to destroy them with mouse clicks. But with difficult clicks. Before clicking the mouse, you must hold down the key with the corresponding keyboard letter. The game will be over as soon as the letters fly past you.

name: Pungolo: A Prickly Adventure
summary: Pungolo is a unique adventure game that offers players a one-of-a-kind experience. With its beautiful graphics, challenging levels, and unique gameplay, Pungolo is sure to captivate players of all ages. So why wait? Grab your roots and explore the magical world of Pungolo today!

name: Public Enemy: The Dark Future
summary:
Public Enemy: The Dark Future is a story-focused sci-fi multiplayer Half-Life modification.

Two teams (The Security Corps and the Syndicate) play the basic role in this game and they will fight against each other in front of this futuristic scenery.

The visual aspects, gameplay features and the design offer you new and interesting possibilities to explore the whole world of Public-Enemy.

name: Puyo Pop Fever
summary: Puyo Pop Fever is a 2003 puzzle video game developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega. It is the fifth main installment in the Puyo Puyo puzzle game series and the second Puyo Puyo game to be programmed by Sonic Team after Puyo Pop (which was released just after the series' original developer, Compile, went bankrupt). This was the start of the what can be considered a reboot of the Puyo Puyo franchise, with this entry's plot revolving around Professor Accord losing her flying cane.

name: Puyo Pop Fever
summary: A port of Puyo Puyo Fever for DS.

name: Puyo Puyo
summary:
Puyo Puyo is Game Gear port of Puyo Puyo. It includes an additional quest mode.

This port only released in Japan but contains a secret English localization with the title Puzlow Kids. This version appears whenever the game cartridge is used in a North American or European system.

name: Pursuit Force
summary:
Experience Pursuit Force originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Five vicious gangs are fighting for control of Capital City. The terrified public has given up hope – and the Chief of Police wants results, fast!

Jump into action as a member of the elite Pursuit Force and rid the state of corruption. Dive behind the wheel of a truck, a speedboat or even a helicopter as you hunt down criminals and recover stolen goods.

This title has been converted from the PSP version to the PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 consoles and provides newly added features.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Numberlink
summary: Numberlink is a puzzle where you connect the same numbers without crossing lines. Trust your instinct and get connecting! Keep in mind that the longer the distance, the harder it gets.

name: Puzzle Boy
summary: Puzzle Boy is a port of the Game Boy title Kwirk, but features more and different levels along with changed graphics. In contrast to the original version, the perspective is straight top-down and there is no undo-function.

name: Putt Party
summary: Putt Party is a putting golf game that you can play with your friends! Play through themed courses simultaneously as you try to get your ball in the hole in the fewest amount of strokes. Scattered throughout the courses are power-ups that can be used to make your shots easier, or your opponent’s shots harder. Players who complete the course in the fewest amount of strokes are the winners!

name: Puyo Puyo CD Tsuu
summary: The PC-Engine CD port features full voice work with a cast consisting entirely of professional voice actors, and also includes character-unique chain phrases.

name: Puyo Puyo CD
summary: A PC-Engine port of the first Puyo Puyo game. Includes full voice acting for cutscenes, in addition to exclusive scenes that play when the difficulty is set to Hardest. Most notably, it also allows both players to choose who they want to play as, making all of the characters playable (except everybody after Witch).

name: Puyo Puyo Sun
summary: Puyo Puyo Sun also as Puyo Puyo 3 is the third installment of the Puyo Puyo game series. The game was initially developed for the Sega Saturn-based ST-V arcade hardware in 1996. The game's title and emphasis on the sun is a play on the Japanese word for the number three, san.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Numberlink
summary:
Intuitive puzzle where you draw lines
to connect the same numbers.

name: Puffer Pop
summary: Puffer Pop is a short puzzle game about saving a pufferfish from the sharks that chase her. Eat bubbles, inflate, and turn the tides on those that would eat you, all while relaxing to calming sound of ocean waves.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever: Minna de Nazo Puyo
summary:
Puyo Puyo Fever: Minna de Nazo Puyo is a mobile game in the style of Nazo Puyo where players have to solve a number of puzzles within certain conditions.
It was released as part of the PuyoSega subscription service for iOS and Android and it is now considered lost media.

name: Puyo Puyo!! Quest Arcade
summary:
Puyo Puyo!! Quest Arcade is an arcade game, featuring puzzle RPG elements and a character card system. The game is basically free to play, only requiring cash for certain actions like refilling stamina. The game requires SEGA's Aime card (or the now-equivalent BanaPassport card from Bandai Namco Games) to store and recall gameplay status.

The service of Puyo Puyo!! Quest Arcade was announced to terminate after March 31 2017, with the removal of cabinets at schedules varying by shop. It will become impossible to play the game after that date.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Yajilin
summary: Draw lines through the centers of cells to make a loop, and paint cells black in this original Nikoli puzzle. It's immensely satisfying to see how the lines and black cells all come together to form a solution, and figuring out how to draw the loop isn't as easy as it might seem.

name: Puppy Moon
summary:
Dogs in space! Dogs in space!
An adorable dog is jumping on the moon looking for its missing master.
Jump further and further!
Collect coins, bones and complete the missions to unlock more dogs.

name: Puyo Puyo! The Medal Edition
summary: Puyo Puyo! The Medal Edition is a coin pusher-styled arcade game based on Puyo Puyo! 15th Anniversary, the fifth in Sega's "Medalink" series.

name: Puyo Puyo DX
summary:
Puyo Puyo DX is a mobile Puyo Puyo game released by SEGA MOBILE in 2004 and is considered to be the deluxe mobile version of Minna de Puyo Puyo. It was included in the Sonic Café/Puyo Sega subscription service when it was released, and included enhanced versions of other Puyo Mobile games that were part of the subscription at the time.

This Puyo game is considered to be Lost Media.

name: Puyo Pop Fever DX
summary: Puyo Puyo Fever DX is a mobile phone game released for i-mode 90x, Vodafone Live! (256KB) and EZweb (BREW 3.1) devices through the Sonic Cafe portal.

name: Puyo Puyo Touch
summary:
Puyo Puyo!! Touch was a free-to-play mobile puzzle video game for iOS and Android.

The game featured the never-before-seen mechanic of "Paint to Clear", which players had to drag to copy the color of Puyo to adjacent ones trying to make 4 or more connect. A clear with 5 or more connected makes an arrow (やじるし) available to make long-reaching clears later. All characters were also able to make use of skills to create arrows and other special items to aid in the puzzle.

On September 30 2016, the service of Puyo Puyo!! Touch was announced to terminate after November 30 2016, making it impossible to play the game after that date.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch
summary: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch is a puzzle game published by Sega for Android, iOS and Windows Mobile 6.5 devices. It is part of the Puyo Puyo series and is based on Puyo Puyo Fever, which was released on consoles and PC.

name: Puyo Puyo Zurashi
summary: Puyo Puyo Zurashi was the third mobile game as a remake of Sega and Sonic Team's original Puyo Puyo Fever made by Sega and Sonic Cafe. This game was released for the Pocket PC as a downloadable game in Japan on October 20, 2006. Unlike all the games in the series so far, this game was never released out of Japan.

name: Puyo Puyo Solitare
summary: Puyo Puyo Solitaire is a mobile game apart of the Puyo Puyo! Sega subscription service released for mobile internet services in 2008-2009 and later, in 2011, for Android devices. It is one of the many games in the subscription and one of some in the Puyo Puyo Fever 2 style. Unfortunately not much info is known about it, same with the subscription service.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch Lite
summary: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch Lite is a puzzle game developed by Sega for Android and iOS devices. It is the free version of Puyo Puyo Fever Touch. The iOS version was only available through the Sega Collection app.

name: Puzzle Go!
summary: Puzzle Go! is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. Players use the mouse to adjust the position of the tiles to restore the picture. As a player, this game provides multiple exquisite CGs as levels. At the same time, the game has carefully prepared a rich achievement system for players.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Yajilin
summary: Draw a loop and paint cells black in this double-challenging original puzzle from Nikoli!

name: Puzzle Adventures
summary: A choose your own adventure game where the player is tasked with finding out how they ended up in the small house on the beach. To answer this mystery the player must solve puzzles and make choices to explore the story.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Habanero
summary:
Puyo Puyo Fever Habanero is a mobile Puyo game released sometime in 2007 by Sega and was apart of the Sonic Café (later Puyo Puyo! Sega) subscription service, a service in which members pay 300¥ a month for access of an exclusive library of Sega games. This game is known for its very high difficulty compared to its sister games, both Puyo Puyo Fever and Puyo Puyo Fever 2. Like both games, it has a RunRun, WakuWaku and HaraHara course. According to the Suwa3 website, only Amitie and Raffina are playable in the game.

This Puyo game is considered as "lost media" due to the fact that a few sources have provided minimal information regarding Puyo Puyo Fever Habanero.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Rhythm
summary: Puyo Puyo Fever Rhythm was a rhythm mobile puyo game released in 2014 through the PuyoSega service which used music and assets from Puyo Puyo Fever, Puyo Puyo Fever 2, Puyo Puyo 15th Anniversary and Puyo Puyo 7. The service ended on December 28, 2015 and music downloads for those that owned it ended on January 28, 2016.

name: Puzzle 26: The 7th Day
summary:
The developer of Doodle Kart announces Puzzle “26”, a puzzle solving game unlike any games that you’ve ever played. Looking for something challenging but also entertaining for your day? Puzzle “26” is the perfect App providing dozens of hours of fun for you. The game is inspired from the traditional game: Minesweeper. However, Puzzle “26” is much more challenging. All the puzzles include 4 different symbols instead of mines. The game rule is so simple that you just need to put the right Egyptian symbols into the right boxes according to the hints.
The game is easy at the beginning, but it becomes harder and harder at the higher levels. The last 20 puzzles are specially designed for genius. If you’re a puzzle lover, this game is definitely your choice.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Yajilin
summary: Draw lines through the centers of cells to make a loop, and paint cells black in this original Nikoli puzzle. It's immensely satisfying to see how the lines and black cells all come together to form a solution, and figuring out how to draw the loop isn't as easy as it might seem.

name: Pure Sniper
summary: Hunt your target & become a strong PVP sniper in this Epic 3D sniper FPS game.Pure Sniper is an exciting and realistic sniper shooting game with a massive campaign mode that can be played offline and a realtime multiplayer PvP combat mode.

name: Puyo Puyo Love Story
summary: Released in MSX2 Disc Station volume #29.

name: Puzzled Towers
summary: This is a tower defense style game set in a dynamic first person world. You create the enemy path in real time. The Alpha Stage comes with a free unlocked steam achievement.

name: Puyoman-Eating Carbuncle
summary: Released in Disc Station volume 14.

name: Puyo Card
summary: Released in Disc Station Vol 23, Puyo Card is a stacking card game. Players place cards onto the middle of the playfield; matching four of the same color will create a chain and damage the opponent.

name: Puffle Paddle 3DS
summary: Puffle Paddle 3DS is a 3DS homebrew port of the Club Penguin mini-game Puffle Paddle.

name: Puzzle Time: Seasons
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of nature and solve puzzles with captivating images of different seasons. Discover the beauty of mountains, forests, seas, and beaches in each season of the year.

name: Pug Hop Mole Bop
summary:
You must protect this yard!
It’s up to you **Gizmo Puddinkiss** to save the day. Bop and hop and make the moles go away!
Tap on your device to make Gizmo jump to the left or to the right. Hold left or right to make him sprint that direction. Land on top of the moles when they show their furry faces!

name: Putin Must Die: Defend the White House
summary: Vladimir has gone mad. He has created an army of Russian-speaking Putin clones to destroy America, and the White House is the final frontier. You must defend the White House against invading hordes of Vladimir clones, or become one of them.

name: Purrfect Catch
summary:
The Dogs need your help! Work together with your feline companion to save the dogs across all manner of magical levels!
A cat-astrophe has occurred, giving the dogs an unwanted bath. Band together with your Cat and Rod and bring them back to dry land. Customise your equipment using the Locker Room, and use unique perks to save more dogs than ever before - and don't forget to go for the high score.

name: Puppet Master: The Game - Curse of the Puppet Master Skin Pack
summary:
You'll take part in Dr.Mcgrew's freakish experiments when you purchase the Curse of the Puppet Master skin pack for Puppet Master: The Game!

Includes skins and emotes based on the Sixth Puppet Master film, Curse of the Puppet Master.

name: Pumuckl: Fangt den Klabauter
summary:
Pumuckl is a small red-haired goblin character from a popular German TV series. His major concern is to trifle with humans.

The non-violent, fun, and educational jump'n'run game with Pumuckl and the Blue Klabauter. Missed opportunities in the game can be compensated for by solving math problems.

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenwood
summary: Dive into 'Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenwood', an engaging hidden object game brimming with elusive cats, interactive elements, and captivating mini-stories. Venture beyond whiskers in a world rich with surprises and discover the wonders of Kittenwood!

name: Puzzle Go
summary: Improve your mental agility with our HD jigsaw puzzles for adults. Enjoy daily relaxation while challenging your cognitive abilities. Choose from a range of captivating images and varying difficulty levels for the ultimate brain workout.

name: Pump It Up Phoenix
summary: Pump it Up Phoenix 2023 arcade dance machine offers the most updated dance machine yet, with over 150 K-pop, original and new music. The PIU series also offers new steps and scoring changes.

name: Puzzle 10
summary: Puzzle 10 is extremely addictive “make 10” puzzle game!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Hitori
summary: "Hitori" is a puzzle in which you fill in any unnecessary numbers, making sure that the same number doesn't appear twice in the same line. Once you get the hang of it, you can feel the joy of figuring out the many various gimmicks thought up by the creator. This is a puzzle for real connoisseurs.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Hitori
summary:
A puzzle for connoisseurs.
Are you up for a challenge?

name: Puddies
summary: Are you curious to discover what lies beyond our planet? Accompany Bean on his space mission and discover an endless number of adorable creatures called Puddies that will have to be trained. Launch yourself into the unknown or you launch him.

name: PuzzleSquare
summary: A Chinese traditional ink-style puzzle game.

name: Puzzle Together: Jigsaw Super Variety Pack
summary: Unlock 20 puzzles depicting a wide variety of themes! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 20 unique puzzles (a $15 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 3 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Putrefier
summary: A single GZDoom map for Doom 2, not only raises the bar but megablasts it up to "how the hell is that even possible?" heights. Putrefier is set in an imposing UAC facility filled with shadows, beasties, and architecture straight out of an idTech 3 game. As you descend into the base, things get weirder, with creepy malfunctioning technology and demonic spaghetti crawling out of the walls in a sickeningly cool manner. There are no fanciful scripted cutscenes, but the thick atmosphere of the map suggests that the experience is part of a larger narrative than what's visible on the surface (a notion heavily reinforced by the set-up to a brilliantly-done boss battle).

name: Puss in Book: Trapped in an Epic Tale
summary: Puss in Boots has fallen into a magic book ruled by a sneaky Storyteller. Only you can help our hero find his way in this interactive story!

name: Pumpkin Panic
summary:
Explore this little farm in the middle of the forest, plant crops, take care of the plants, go fishing, or whatever you prefer, but have a good time!

But be careful, they say that strange things are happening in the area...

name: Puzzle Boys
summary: Lots of handsome and muscular men in this puzzle game.

name: Puky
summary: Who Is Master?! Come on !! Help Puky be a competent watch dog.

name: Punchimals
summary: Puchimals is a physics-based 2.5D fighting game set in a world where cute, chubby animals settle their differences by duking it out in giant mechs. Due to a lack of exercise (certainly not caused by overuse of mechs in everyday life), obesity and mech combat has ravaged the globe!

name: Push That Cat!!
summary: In this game you will learn how to effortlessly move your feline friend across space and time.

name: Pulse of Love
summary: "Pulse of Love" is a captivating visual novel set in the vibrant world of the Korean K-pop scene drama. Experience the exhilarating journey of love, passion, and self-discovery as you navigate the highs and lows of fame.

name: Pusher: Drug Tycoon
summary: Thrilling business tycoon sim where you step into the shoes of a drug dealer in 1980s USA. Your main goal is simple: Buy low and sell high. Get ready for an experience where you'll combine strategy, risk-taking, and decision-making to build your criminal empire.

name: Pumping Station
summary: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. Mouselook is recommended, but not required. Dynamic light must be enabled.

name: Puzzle Bonsai
summary: Puzzle Bonsai is a fresh and relaxing puzzle game where you take on the challenge of combining parts of the puzzle tree to form a correct equation. An excellent way to keep your thinking nimble every day of the year!

name: Puzzle da Moro!
summary: Mobile phone action puzzle game distributed for J-Sky 50KB devices through the Ulala no Channel J portal.

name: Pulse Codex EP
summary: Decode the control glyph and challenge strange entities in a short audiovisual composition / videogame hybrid.

name: Pucca Jam
summary: Pucca Jam is a fan made flash game. Press the correct letter on your keyboard when Pucca or Garu are over the blossom icon. The closer to the beat you are the more points you get!" Their is 6 levels in total (3 levels per character).

name: Puropu Defense Squad
summary: Co-op action-tower-defense game where you defend your precious extractor against hordes of wacky humans. Build dozens of traps, turrets, items and use your hero’s abilities in 1-4 player campaigns, and against other players in unique PvP game modes!

name: Puppetmaster
summary: Discover a metroidvania with a huge world, platform-fighter dynamic combat, smart bosses, deep lore, and original music, all made by two brothers.

name: Puzzillion
summary: A logic puzzles 3D first person game. Move things around, toggle switches, open doors, blend colors - train your brain solving challenge after challenge. Includes classic puzzles and new puzzles, physics and logic, light and electricity, twists and surprises.

name: Purrfect Survivors
summary: Kill monsters, Gather paws, then you will be stronger and stronger! Purrfect Survivors is a roguelite game, which you need to get runes and arrange them against the thousands of monsters. Every rune has its own ability and it shows completely different ability depending on where you arrange it.

name: Puppy Drome
summary: A game made for the minild educational compo.

name: Purple Rain
summary: Purple Rain is a short 5-10 minute single map that has been designed to work with Dehacked Vanilla Doom. The map has been throughly tested to make sure that none of the Vanilla Doom errors like VPOs and Savegame Buffer occur. The intended difficulty is Ultra-Violence but all skills are implemented (not sure if Nightmare/Fast is possible).

name: Puyo Ponyo Lines
summary: Join the kawaii puyoponyo! Form a line and clear them now! Many stages are waiting for you!

name: Puzzle Valley
summary: Puzzle Valley is a puzzle game which is set in a small and peaceful world. The goal is to explore this world and discover new puzzles and some hints to solve them.

name: Pumpkin Hell
summary: Have a spooky map anyways. This was originally mapped for Pigeon Speedmapping Session hosted by Bonnie, but I wanted to flesh the concept out into a more substantial map. This should take you about 10 to 20 minutes. Par time for the original was 2:00, for reference.

name: Pushpully
summary: Pushpully is a puzzle game where you try to reach the end of the level by changing your polarity and interacting with magnetic blocks around the levels.

name: Puppets' Dream TD
summary: On the night I saved the world, I died. A tower defense game in which the main character travels through the world after his death. Collect characters and items, organize your party, and find out the mysteries hidden in the world.

name: Puppeteer: Control
summary: Puppet Master Simulator. Become the Puppet Master and find exhibits for your toy house hells collection.

name: Punisher
summary: A rehashed MAP01 - but with more monsters than you can shake a BFG at.

name: Puzzle Room Escape
summary: A quick and simple escape game. Escape from a room with puzzles.

name: PuzzleLand
summary: A Flash-based puzzle game much like the Hapland series, players must safely guide James Mahoggany to the end of each screen. To do this, the player must click on a series of objects on the screen in the correct order. Different scenarios play out depending on which objects were clicked first, leading to many dead-end scenarios where the player must try again.

name: Push The Squares
summary:
Push The Squares is a new game in which you have to find the proper way to connect squares with stars of the same color.
Will you be able to complete all the +100 levels of the game?

name: Put Up Your Dukes!
summary: Put Up Your Dukes! is a single-level PWAD for Doom II requiring the GZDoom source port that came out in 2015. It was designed by Sgt. Shivers and uses the music track. Its submission to the Doomjà-Vu contest was awarded with the runner-up spot

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Kakuro
summary: The royal road of pencil puzzles, this puzzle is extremely fun. In "Kakuro", you break down the totaled numbers given as hints to fill in the spaces. Well. We say "break down the numbers", but in Nikoli's Kakuro very little calculations are actually required, with concentration and the power of deduction being the most necessary attributes.

name: Puzzling Wild: DLC - 400 Extra Puzzle Pack
summary: This puzzle pack has 400 extra puzzles for the game Puzzling Wild IQ Test. They offer more of a challenge to the original puzzles.

name: Puda + The Kid
summary: Embark on a captivating grid-based dungeon crawler adventure as you join Puda and The Kid on a journey through the treacherous realms of Eldo. Customize your party, create powerful weapons, and chart the unexplored territories of Eldo.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Kakuro
summary: A classic logic puzzle that's immensely fun!

name: Pumping Simulator 2
summary: A gas station management game, start by selling a car to raise funds and invest in an abandoned plot of land. Build, expand, and upgrade your gas station, diversify services, customize and manage time efficiently during peak hours. And maybe you will become rich

name: Puzzle Grid
summary:
Puzzle Grid features over 1000 brainteasing puzzles over 4 game types and 100's of unique pieces!
4 games and over 1000 levels will keep you entertained for hours. Relax with easy levels or challenge yourself with mind boggling challenging levels.
Train your brain with these fun puzzles using logic, pattern matching and a little perseverance!

name: Pucca Wars
summary: Gather a squad of 5 funny heroes and participate in the battles against various opponents. Apply incredible skills of your heroes and win! In this merry Android game you will experience incredible adventures, hunt treasures and fight against hordes of enemies. Complete interesting missions and enlarge your collection of characters. Gain experience and develop heroes increasing their characteristics. Join a guild and play with your friends. Fight against other players worldwide, win, get rich prizes and increase your rating.

name: Pucca, Let’s Cook!
summary: A Pucca mobile game.

name: Puzzle Game
summary: Jump into the puzzle-solving action of The "Puzzle Game" and discover what Grandpa left for you.

name: Pudding
summary: "Let's defeat the demon lord together!" A thrilling action-adventure of destruction!

name: Puzzle Journey
summary:
"Wild Waters and Earthy Wonders: A Matching Adventure"

Explore the captivating world of land and sea creatures in this thrilling card matching game.
Test your memory and observation skills as you uncover pairs of enchanting images depicting animals from both the wild waters and the earthy wonders.
With four challenging difficulty modes, embark on an adventure filled with fun and discovery.
Match, explore, and win as you unravel the mysteries behind each card.

name: Puzzle Kombat
summary: A puzzle game with the Mortal Kombat motif.

name: Puzzle of Selene
summary: Dive into a fantasy world with this charming picture-matching puzzle game! Solve puzzles with unique female characters in a beautiful world and enjoy full-voice episodes with them. A new adventure where puzzle solving and excitement intersect awaits you.

name: Pure Mini Golf and Pool Puzzles Bundle
summary: Experience the ultimate gaming combo with Pool Puzzles and Pure Mini Golf!

name: Puzzle Games Bundle: 5 in 1 - vol.2
summary: Train your brain with this awesome puzzle bundle!

name: Pulse
summary: Pulse is a stripped down action-puzzle game made exclusively for Playdate.

name: Puzzle Colony
summary:
Welcome, mighty adventurer!
Can you defeat the armies of the undead and drive them away from the royal islands?
Set sail for a great pirate adventure, improve your crew and recruit powerful allies to liberate villages and settlements. Get powerful weapons and artifacts from pirate treasures and become the greatest buccaneer of the kingdom. Only if you earn the Queen's goodwill, a glorious future awaits you.

name: Purple Explorer
summary: Welcome to the enchanting world of Purple Explorer, where cuteness and adventure collide! Join our plucky protagonist, the lovable Purple Explorer girl, as she embarks on a heartwarming 3D platforming journey through vibrant worlds filled with stars, coins, hearts, and charming surprises.

name: Pumpkinman
summary: Pumpkinman is variation of classical arcade games in Halloween setting. Travel through world of mystery, full of creatures from tales and horror stories. Improve Your skills and face final adversity.

name: Push
summary: This adventure puzzle RPG game revolves around box-pushing as its primary gameplay mechanic. Encounter mysterious mechanisms and puzzles, necessitating careful observation of surroundings and the use of clues for solution. Showcase intelligence and courage to escape this perilous place!

name: PushOver
summary: Push your friends (or the computer) off the platforms in this chaotic 2D platform fighting game. With multiple gamemodes and even a single player mode you can push as much as your heart desires!

name: Puppet Master: Full Moon Toys - Totem & Mephisto Skins
summary: After years of experiments, Andre Toulon has created puppets that want to play with you! Play the game in style with skins inspired by the hot 90s action figure toy line. Includes skins for Totem Sutekh and Mephisto!

name: Pure Badminton
summary: Pure Badminton is the most realistic Badminton simulation game. Experience the sensations of badminton, in a fast, technical and strategical game.

name: Puke the Pirate
summary:
Help Puke the Pirate run, jump, puke, and fart-fly his way through many levels of adventure!
Collect as much of Black Barf's treasure as you can!

name: Puzzle Series Vol. 1: Sudoku
summary: "Sudoku", which is a hot topic all over the world, is finally coming to Wii. It is also interesting to play by choosing from 4 difficulty levels by yourself, and to challenge how many questions you can clear within the time limit. In addition, you can register up to 100 questions, so you can copy the questions in the newspaper and play with them, or you can create your own original questions. In addition, the two-player battle mode is also fulfilling. In "Point Battle", you can use the item panel, and you can play while bargaining, such as "chain" and "quick placement". In "speed battle", you compete for which one has cleared many problems in the same time. Of course, there is plenty of support for beginners. You can proceed while learning the rules in the hands-on tutorial.

name: Puzzle Balls
summary: Solve the puzzle to release the blue ball

name: Purple Place
summary: Welcome to "Purple Place - Classic Games" a fun-filled game where you'll embark on three exciting adventures like good old times! Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of creativity and challenge.

name: Puzzle toys
summary: Leisure puzzle game

name: Pumpkin Jam
summary: Pretty large very Halloween-themed map for Doom 2 for limit-removing ports. Features new spooky appearances for some of the enemies, although they are all functionally the same. The only exception is arachnotron who has smaller hitbox to fit his new sprites and also slower movement speed to compensate for that.

name: Puzzle Series Vol. 3: Sudoku
summary: Third game in the Puzzle Series by Hudson Soft. Released March 23, 2006 in Japan and later localized as Sudoku Gridmaster in North America and Sudoku Master in Europe.

name: Punch the Garden
summary: Punch the Garden is a 2D action roguelike where you play as a young moustache that is entering a park. Within said park, you battle the merry residents and stop their cheerful dances! Get stronger as you progress and become a better moustache!

name: Puma: The Cat
summary: Play as Puma, a cat on a quest to find her friend Mia. Explore challenging maps and confront enemies in this thrilling 2D pixel art platform game.

name: Puzzlerio
summary: Puzzlerio is a puzzle game about creating a factory that takes ores from one point to another. Use transport belts, inserters, furnaces and tunnels to complete the factory.

name: Pulsars & Crowbars
summary: Pulsars and Crowbars is a rogue-like deck builder that combines grid-based tactical gameplay with character-driven storytelling. Unlock cards, craft your deck and save the galaxy!

name: Pumpkin Ghost
summary: A war between ghosts and machines has broken out in the underworld and it's up to you the pumpkin Queen to face her old friend and put an end to this spooky Halloween themed madness! Inspired by Touhou and Nier automata.

name: Pullfrog: Deluxe
summary: Tetris meets frog! A little puzzle platformer made for Pico-8, equal parts fun and challenging. Help a little frog clear as many lines as possible by using its tongue to pull around blocks in the air.

name: Pulsar
summary: Pulsar is a VR shooter that combines procedural generation with your music. Built in audio analysis will challenge your reflexes and accuracy with dynamic game play and visual effects. Key Features: in-game file browser and audio analysis 10 different worlds 2 game modes Weapon customization

name: Pumpkin Game
summary: "Pumpkin Game" is a falling object puzzle game in which players try to pile up as many vegetables as possible so that they do not overflow from the basket. When two or more vegetables collide with each other, they combine and evolve into a larger vegetable.

name: Puzzle Land
summary: Puzzle Land is a remake of the gameboy game Daedalian opus also known as puzzle road in japan.

name: Puzzle Cube
summary: Solve the 3x3 cube from a 2D perspective and set a record time! Tutorial video available on YouTube via in-game link. Various backgrounds, music, and cube skins to customize the experience. Timer can be turned off for learning or casual play. Online leaderboards track best times.

name: Puzzle Vacations: Christmas
summary:
Wishing you a season full of light and laughter for you and your family.
With tons of challenging puzzles to choose from, stunning scenery to enjoy, you can coddiwomple towards Christmas at your own pace.

name: Purdy-Durdy
summary: A tiny hurdy-gurdy simulator for Playdate.

name: Punch Jump
summary: Punch Jump is a diffcult/rage platformer. Your job is relatively simple: bring Carl to the top of the level. This will not be easy and the player will fail numerous times. This game is inspired by games like Jump King. It is a Foddian rage platformer.

name: Pumpkin Party
summary: Pumpkin Party brings the Halloween spirit with first-person PvP mini-games. Escape haunted mazes, collaborate in a spooky kitchen, and more. Perfect for festive gatherings and making new friends, it's your go-to for thrilling, laughter-filled Halloween fun!

name: Pure Nastalgia
summary: This one of a kind gem provides you with the opportunity to sample most if not all of your favorite Super Mario Bros. games. Many of the greatest and most brilliant level designs ever invented from previous SMB titles have been selected, reimagined, and added to this unforgettable compendium to provide a brand new, fun and nostalgic experience for the family. This 38 level anthology is far more than simply a compilation as it also features custom level designs as well as hidden warp zones and coin rooms.

name: Puzzle Planet
summary: Puzzle Planet offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and world exploration, perfect for solo players and groups of friends. This game invites players to embark on a virtual world tour, piecing together jigsaw puzzles that feature stunning real-world locations from every corner of the globe.

name: Puke
summary: Puke... No one loves this town. No one walks by. The departing trains are empty. But why? Listening to the townsfolk and witnessing the events there is your job. Go there as the investigative journalist you are to find out what's going on with the locals' lives.

name: Pump Press
summary: You control a robot that is constantly moving forward. Your goal is to pump the balloons that are coming towards you by shooting them. If you shoot a balloon 4 times, it will pop. Press a button to shoot and hold a button to go faster. The balloons will remain behind you once they pass you and deflate again. The enemy will push all deflated balloons to the left border. You score points for every balloon that hits the border. To score more points, chain up the balloons.

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenbay
summary: Explore 'Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenbay', where elusive felines await discovery in a day-and-night adventure. Find hidden cats, interact with locals, and unveil the charming secrets of Kittenbay!

name: Pussy Kingdom: Queen of Passion
summary: Embark on a magical adventure where you will have to unite all the kingdoms and save the world from evil.

name: Puppet Master: The Game - Movie Edition Blade + Execution
summary: Get ready for an adrenaline-packed experience with the Movie Edition Blade Pack! Dive into the action with a fully revamped Blade character model, a cutting-edge Weapon Model featuring a brand-new brutal Execution for Blade. Customize your combat style with 6 stunning weapon skins. Blade is geared up and prepared for battle, showcasing his fierce prowess with the Axis Termination emote!

name: Puzzle Vacations: Australia and New Zealand
summary: Relax and enjoy more than 120 unique puzzles featuring high-quality images showcasing the landscape and culture from the land down under!

name: Puzzmo
summary: The (new) place for thoughtful puzzles. From award-winning game designer Zach Gage and engineer Orta Therox, along with Hearst Newspapers, Puzzmo is a fresh spin on a cultural mainstay: the newspaper games page.

name: Purrfect Rescue
summary: Purrfect Rescue is a hidden object game where you must find and rescue all the alley kittens in the city, placing them up for adoption.

name: Purgatory Salvation
summary: Purgatory Salvation is a multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of the Keeper of The Purgatory (Killer), and the other players play as Survivors, trying to escape from Purgatory and avoid being caught and killed.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 21
summary: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 21 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 22
summary: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 22 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 23
summary: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 23 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 24
summary: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 24 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 25
summary: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 25 has arrived with this update.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 26
summary: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 26 has arrived with this update.

name: Purah's Lab
summary:
Purah is waiting for you!!
Her lab is a mess and everybody is busy to help her to finish her experiment...

A machine that can detect all your most sensible points of your body and make you explode in a pleasure that no human can give you.

That's why Purah needs you to pass her the items to build the machine in the shortest time possible and without any mistakes or the energy used in the machine will be overloaded and horrible things could happen...

name: Puzzle & Dragons Story
summary: A puzzle RPG made exclusively for Apple Arcade.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 27
summary: A new rotation strategy after careful consideration of player feedback regarding our map rotation system. Rotations will now vary between map selection and random map regions.

name: Pultimush
summary: Third in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Pursuit of the Pink Panther
summary: Pursuit of the Pink Panther was based off the famous cartoon series and inspired by the Pink Panther movies starring Peter Sellers as inspector Clouseau. This game actually started out life as Trail of the Pink Panther by U.S. Games (based on the then current movie), but when U.S. Games went out of business they sold the rights to North American Phillips (NAP) who decided to release their own version of the game through their Probe 2000 division. It is unknown if any work was already done on the U.S. Games version or if any of those ideas were used in the Probe 2000 version of the game. Although Pursuit of the Pink Panther was heavily marketed at the June 1983 CES, it was never released, most probably because the special RAM/ROM chip that NAP used to squeeze all the graphics and gameplay elements into the game couldn't be reliably manufactured. When the first batch of chips came back defective from the manufacturer NAP decided to cancel the game rather than try and find a new source for the chips. The crumbling game market at the time was also a big factor in choosing not to go forward. Description: 'Players control the Pink Panther as he sneakily makes his way through several screens, attempting to outwit the Inspector. For his final challenge, he must dangle from a swinging rope, steal the famous Pink Panther diamond and escape unnoticed.'

name: Push Push Boom
summary: Alice, the protagonist of the game, enters a different world by mistake and finds that all the delicious food she likes has become a monster that can eat people. Alice wants to avoid the monster's pursuit while she wants to defeat the monster through her own wisdom and return to her own world.

name: PUFIWEHO
summary: Protecting Us From Incredibly Worrisome Extremely Hostile Oddities...is what you will be doing with your football! Defend the Earth from the invading disciples of the Deranged Octopus, and learn the ultimate secret of the Universe.

name: Puckish
summary: Puckish, a mixed reality game of sentient billiards where all the rules are hidden in the text of a physical 140 year old book of etiquette.

name: Puppeteer's Curse
summary: It's a first-person horror room escape game. You have to solve puzzles in a dark atmosphere, avoiding monitors. Never get caught.

name: Push The Cat with WASD
summary: A cat-pushing puzzle game where narratives are puzzle levels. With an emotional story and a little bit of 4th wall breaking. By pushing the cat, you are pushing the cat to think, to remember why they are stuck in this game...

name: Punk Juice
summary: Join a band with two crass, potty-mouthed punks, Ricki and Max. Curate your style, endure the trials and tribulations of public transit, and play dead-end gigs! Go on mediocre dates, thrift with your besties, buy overpriced coffee, and complain about rent in this Seattle-inspired grungy city.

name: Puzzle Club
summary: This is a mysterious and challenging puzzle game that includes various types of puzzles and mechanisms, such as numeric passwords, graphic passwords, text passwords, etc. Each puzzle requires careful thinking to find the correct answer.

name: Puzzle Girls: Cute
summary: Enjoy some cute puzzle action in this relax-alot one handed puzzle game.

name: Puzzle Girls: Alexa
summary: Alexa wants you to join her in having fun whilst playing this relaxing puzzle game.

name: Puzzle Monarch: Zombie
summary: Solve 15 sets of ancient puzzles and unlock your way to the bottom of the tomb. Each set contains a three by three and six by six puzzle. To move on to the next level you will have to solve both puzzles and journey deeper into the tomb.

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenrock
summary:
Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenrock" welcomes you to a richly interactive 2D world set in a picturesque mountain resort. The hand-drawn scene in Kittenrock is a labor of love, brimming with intricate details, natural beauty, and humorous Easter eggs, inviting thorough exploration and discovery.

The gameplay blends classic hidden object mechanics with a unique twist—interactive people and cats around the map, enhancing the engagement and depth of the experience. Your primary goal is to spot the skillfully hidden cats that merge seamlessly into the scenic resort surroundings, often revealed through playful interactions with the environment and its inhabitants.

name: Puzzle Journey
summary: "Puzzle Journey" is the kind of game that captivates you for hours on end. It's perfect for players looking to unwind alone or those wanting to spend quality time with family and friends. Are you ready to take on the challenge? Come and experience "Puzzle Journey" today!

name: Pucchin Puzzle
summary: Pucchin Puzzle provides a variation on the nonogram puzzle genre. Players control a square-shaped dog on a grid; players need to mark specific squares in the grid to reveal pixel-art pictures, following hints on the top and left sides of the screen. The game's puzzles are divided into many different themed worlds, laid out on a world map, with different graphical styles and different costumes for the main characters in each different world.

name: Pulse Online
summary: Players on their own and with the help of other players delve into the mechanics of the game. The development of game content, the discovery of new stars, technologies, and plotlines depends solely on the users' activity. The market is open, prices are determined by the players themselves. Social interaction is the most important and essential aspect in the game Pulse Online. Purchasing in-game goods does not affect the combat balance.

name: Punk
summary: Punk is an action roguelike set in a mysterious open world with bullet hell combat and big emphasis on exploration. Fight your way through varied biomes, interact with diverse ecosystems and collect modules that you can use to customize your ship.

name: Puzzles of the Paladin
summary: A free sokoban-like game with RPG items and Monsters, inspired by the game Dungeon and Puzzles by Nekolyst, made in PICO-8.

name: Pull The Pin: Ball Physic Puzzle
summary: Classic physics based puzzle - color the balls and fill the glass with colored balls while avoiding obstacles!

name: Puzzlerama
summary: Puzzlerama is a collection of the best puzzles in the store: Lines, Tangram, Pipes, Blocks, Dots, Shikaku, Unroll, Unblock, Sokoban and Bridges all in one game. It is the definitive stop for puzzle lovers, with more than 4,000 levels to relax, unwind and sharpen your logic skills. Better than any brain training, these Zen puzzles have no time limits but almost infinite fun! Puzzlerama merged all the king puzzles in a collection that will keep your mind active and entertained for hundreds of hours. And more puzzle games will be added in the future.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 28
summary:
The map service has been updated to closely reflect regional preferences.
Introducing PUBG's first electric vehicle. Ride the new 6-seater Pico Bus and discover the unique charm of electric vehicles as you hit the roads of Rondo! Explore new ways to jump, strengthen teamwork, and have a bit more fun with our new vaulting features.

name: Puck-Man Puzzler
summary:
This is Debiru's second NES game made with Retro Puzzle Maker. Here is the description on what he says about his homebrew:

"Puck-Man Puzzler I couldn't exactly copy Pac-Man, or steal any graphic's from his existing games, so I had to make my own original Graphics, which are not that great as my Puck-Man isn't animated an is based on a Square but it works for now this is just the first Demo, of what may or may not become a full game. It only has 8 levels..

Unlike Pac-Man there are no Ghost, Enemies, or Power Pellets in this game instead you just collect the coins then go to the exit to proceed to the next level. This is just the concept I am trying out for now in future versions it may be a bit different."

name: Punchgolf
summary: Play as a golf ball that can jump and be punched to get past obstacles to your goal! with a cast of weird golf balls.

name: Putrika 1st.Cut: The Reason She Must Perish
summary: "Even though I knew this love was forbidden..." While the tragedy is being told, the girl's true love is revealed! Enjoy this crazy pure love drama with beautiful visuals and cute characters!

name: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop
summary: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Puyo Puyo, the classic and widely loved Japanese matching puzzle game, exclusively at Apple Arcade. Dive into a whimsical realm filled with adorable characters and, where popping Puyos becomes a delightful pastime, where every match is a rewarding moment!

name: Puzzle Maker
summary: “Puzzle Maker” is a puzzle game in which you can easily create your own puzzles, as well as play ready-made ones. To complicate or simplify the game, there are customization settings - the number, shapes and boundaries of puzzle pieces.

name: Puppet House
summary: A disturbing horror game set in the abandoned house of a deceased ventriloquist. Take on the role of Rick and unravel the mystery of the mansion, be careful because you won't be alone. Do you dare to cross the threshold to discover the truth?

name: Put it here
summary: "Put it Here" is a casual puzzle gameplay that includes item storage, arrangement,Here players need to place scattered items according to certain rules. A variety of interesting and healing levels are waiting for you to unlock!

name: Punch The Undead
summary: The undead are attacking! With your fists of justice are you tough enough to beat them back to the grave?

name: Punchline
summary: Punchline is an RPG and card management game where you live the life of a fighter. Strengthen your character through training, and as you control their life, engage in battles using cards to defeat your opponents.

name: Puzzle Garage
summary: Online puzzles is a logic game for adults and children that can be played on a computer, tablet or smartphone. Multiplayer Puzzles is an online version of the game for several players.

name: Pursuit of Laughter
summary: Your spirit has been reawakened by the Jester God and you must embark on a journey where humor and darkness intertwine, navigate mysteries with laughter as your guide in a world where whimsy shadows logic.

name: Puzzle Chasers
summary: Puzzle Chasers is a puzzle game filled with adventure, mystery, and romance! Someone is stealing the world’s greatest landmarks! Put the pieces together to save them!

name: Puzzle Adventure VR
summary: Embark with us on a journey in Puzzle Adventure VR! A classic match blocks type game, for the first time in VR. Crush colorful blocks in a cartoon-styled VR world. Relaxing and intuitive, perfect for all ages, offering a blend of tranquil visuals, engaging puzzles, and a soothing soundtrack.

name: Puzzle: Animals
summary: PUZZLE: ANIMALS - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and get a picture of different animals.

name: Puzzletime: Castle Party
summary: Castle Party is the new game in the PUZZLETIME series. Visit a private party in the old castle with beautiful girls and discover what secrets the corridors of the estate keep. Find out what trouble 3 beautiful girls will get in 9 different scenes.

name: Puzzle Monarch: Super Natural
summary: An ancient tomb has been uncovered and it's filled with hidden treasures. Solve 15 sets of ancient puzzles and unlock your way to the bottom of the tomb. Each set contains a three by three and six by six puzzle.

name: Puzzle Vacations: Greece And Turkey - Collector's Edition
Pumpkin Woods
summary: Collect magical ingredients and build your cozy witch home while exploring the wonderful sights and secrets of these mysterious lands. Beware though, danger might be lurking deep in these woods...

name: Puzzle: Lines and Knots - Free Levels Pack
summary: The DLC contains +50 free game levels.

name: Puzzle: Lines and Knots 2 - Free Levels Pack
summary: The DLC contains +44 free game levels.

name: Puzzle: Lines and Knots 2
summary: Logical puzzle game for meditation and relaxation. The goal of the game is to assemble a puzzle consisting of knots.

name: Purpose 1951
summary: "Purpose 1951" is an almost pure walking simulator set in the United States of 1951. You play as a retired doctor whose life falls apart.

name: PuzzSinker
summary: A Puyo-Puyo adjacent HellSinker fan-game.

name: Pup Champs
summary: A tactical puzzle game about leading a football team of cute dogs! Solve puzzles, score goals and become the champions!

name: PuzzMiX
summary:
In PuzzMiX, players will control falling "Lola Pods" to merge pairs into increasingly larger types. As the Lola Pods get bigger and bigger, the player will earn bigger scores as the chaos becomes even harder to control. Online leaderboards are included to show off the best Lola MiXers around the world.

When players earn a certain amount of score, they'll unlock a new song from Lola herself to listen to during the game. 19 vocal tracks are included in addition to 1 instrumental BGM.

name: Purpose Calling
summary: Saving people, solving puzzles, and repairing what’s broken. Designed for young heroes aged 7-9, Purpose Calling invites players to step into the shoes of a hero who's power suit allow them to be a detective, EMT, firefighter, and construction worker to make a difference, one adventure at a time!

name: Pure Electric Love "What do you want?" Eri Kitami: Additional scenario 1

name: Purgatory Survivors
summary: Purgatory Survivors is a top-down shooter with roguelike elements. Plunge into a dark fantasy world infested with demons and despair all fighting for you to fail. Choose your character, primary and secondary guns, and achieve the best synergy with the upgrades to pass the purgatory trial.

name: PUIQ: Demons
summary: PUIQ: Demons is a game where you must survive several waves of demons and bosses for 30 minutes to win. Gain powers, passives and combine them to get buffs, as well as buy turrets to help you on this journey.

name: Publish or Perish
summary: Publish or Perish is a game that simulates working in academia. In order to keep your job, you must publish scientific work. Reviewers are here to get you and all you can do is try to survive. Can you publish enough papers to enjoy tenure? (Contains practical advice for academics)

name: Puss in Boots: Purrfect Adventures
summary:
Embark on a feline-fueled journey in "Puss in Boots: Purrfect Adventures"! This thrilling 2D platformer game invites players into a whimsical world where our daring hero, Puss in Boots, sets out on a daring quest to save the day.

As Puss in Boots, players must traverse through enchanting landscapes, leaping across platforms and collecting coins to unlock a treasure trove of upgrades. Gather enough coins to customize your adventure with powerful bullets and fortify your health, arming yourself for the challenges ahead.

name: Purple Slime Production Line
summary: Guide the slimes to their destiny, across 100 levels of gravity shifting puzzle action!

name: Purple Orchid
summary: Step into the "Purpled Orchid," an immersive simulation game where you take on the role of an inspector at a bustling strip club. Your primary responsibility is to ensure that all workers have the correct documentation to legally perform at the club. With a sharp eye for detail and a knack for detecting discrepancies, you will navigate through a series of challenging scenarios.

name: Pumpkin Attack!
summary:
The Halloween’s Day is coming but the skeletons want to replace it with the Skeleton’s Day! Only Pumpkin Smith riding a rocket with a laser cannon can save the day!

Defeat the minions and fight the four skeleton bosses: Skeletog, Skeledemon, Skelebi, and Skeleskull. Each final boss has a weak point, but you need to discover it.

name: Purple Pink Summer Beach
summary:
Beach Dressup!
Help Purple Pink select a cute outfit for the vacation! A swimsuit? Or a red dress? Don’t forget to match some accessories like a nice straw hat and a pair of sunglasses!

name: Purple Pink Chinese Food

name: Purple Pink Math
summary: Have fun learning and practicing math with Purple Pink! This app will help your preschoolers build foundational math skills and practice mathematical thinking, both at home and in school. Not only could your little ones learn about numbers and shapes, easy laws of math, but also discover the fun of math in real lives.

name: Purple Pink English

name: Purple Pink Game Box

With 40 mini games ranging from daily life facts like weather, housework, cooking and washing routines to basic knowledge like weather, shapes, colors and numbers, your toddler will benefit a lot from this educational app!

name: Purple Pink Jobs Mix
summary: What’s your kid’s dream job? An artist, a scientist, a teacher or an astronaut? Through this matching game, kids could learn about different jobs in a playful way!

name: Pursuit Force: Extreme Justice
summary: This game is a sequel to the first Pursuit Force. This is a game which alternates between driving and shooting, in which you must keep Capital City safe from five ruthless and well-equipped gangs.

name: Put Up
summary: You control the main character who has to take the red ball. When you insert the red ball into the hole in the wall, an exit appears. Once the hero enters there, the level is considered passed. There are a total of 15 levels. The game ends when you complete the last level. To open the chest with a question mark, climb onto the chest and press the down button. There are also secret brick blocks that open in the same way. The hero's lives increase by one for every 20,000 points.

A once prosperous continent now lies frozen due to the bizarre magic of the undead.
The humans, dragons, and other magical creatures who once lived here perished, escaped, or were displaced to desolate lands.

name: Puzzle Garden

name: Puzzlemazed
summary: Classic Arcade, 2D, Puzzle and Mazed, pixel art. Easy to Play, Hard to Complete. Puzzlemazed is one genuine medieval challenge. The ancient lands of Atlas, dominated by three kingdoms. Humans coexisted with the Titans in perfect harmony, Discover the history of one great adventure.

name: Puss in Woods
summary: What will Jack do? Can he take care of his wife and also look after his farm and survive the winter?

name: Purry & Panther: Lost in Helsinki
summary: Purry and Panther have gone missing in Helsinki. Investigate the sights around the city and talk to the locals to help you on the case. Find Purry and Panther before they get into even more trouble.

name: Puzzle Box: Animals
summary: Experience the thrill of solving puzzles in the animal world! Choose from a variety of puzzle sizes to challenge your skills with two game modes.

name: Puzzle World: Funny Dogs

name: Purple: Director's Cut
summary:
It’s 1996.

You play as Randall Purpura, a 23 year old man who has just been released from a lengthy hospital visit for mysterious reasons. He lives in a small studio apartment in LA California.

He meets Mya, his new neighbor who wants to become quick friends with him.

He also meets Tate, the handsome man down the hall. He never seems to be home when you want him to be.

Explore the city, solve puzzles and try to unlock the mysteries of Randall’s past.

name: Punch A Plant!
summary: Smash into Punch a Plant!—a thrilling VR action game where you protect your spaceship's generators from mutated plant enemies. Use powerful fist gauntlets to punch, smash, and survive. Play solo or with friends in an endless survival mode. Get ready for intense, immersive combat and nonstop action!

name: Puzzle Kids
summary:
Help your old mysterious grandfather to sort through his basement of relics and put together all those puzzles he hasn’t had time to piece together yet!

You better hurry though because time is running out, and you may have to sacrifice something valuable to keep going.

Puzzle kids is a local multiplayer game where you and three others must work together to finish jigsaw puzzles by picking up and placing down pieces.

But the light is slowly going out and you need to burn things to keep it alive.

Complete a majority of the puzzle to proceed to the next one. In levels with multiple puzzles you have to build the correct puzzle in the correct frame.

name: Purple Prose for Purple Hearts: **** the Witch
summary:
Meet Lucia. You're probably wondering how she-

okay, okay - you're probably not wondering that. She certainly is though; she tends to do it far too much. Today, she's had a funny idea: it includes, among other things, capturing a person in a pretty consensual, laidback, entirely safe manner to have a drawn out conversation about, like...God, the moral bankruptcy of 1900s psychological studies...anime maybe?

If that sounds trite on its face, well, perhaps it is. What ensues though is an event unheard of on the Last World, the world located most closely to the end of the universe and the last one we are ever likely to get in this lifetime. It is a leisurely trip through a maze with jagged edges. It becomes a commentary upon commentary as commentators gather to gawk and speculate about a series of events no one can really firmly understand.

And what the hey: you stick around after the end, we got romance, thrills, chills, and things it would be impolitic to talk about as a lead-in to an adventure through comforting environs with a witch and her agenda.

name: Purple
summary:
A purple puzzle game for you!

Can you make the screen purple in 50 levels?
Each level has its own logic.

name: Puzzle Castle
summary: Puzzle Castle is an edutainment title based on the eponymous book from Usborne. The player takes on the role of Sophie the knight, the only person in the kingdom who is brave enough to find out what monster is lurking deep in the dungeons of Puzzle Castle.

name: Punishing Gray Raven
summary: Punishing Gray Raven is an action RPG set in a dystopian future where humanity battles extinction from the Punishing Virus. Players lead the Gray Raven, a team of elite cyborgs, in reclaiming their world through fast-paced combat and strategic team building. Inspired by anime aesthetics, the game blends real-time action with deep narrative exploration of identity and survival, where players strategically command a diverse roster of characters with unique abilities to overcome challenges and enemies.

Puzzle Dungeon!! is a series of games where fantasy classes solve puzzles themed after their abilities!

In Puzzle Dungeon!!: Earthmage Erin, play as Erin, an Earthmage with the power to control gravity. Solve 30+ puzzles in themed dungeons to rescue Erin's lost goats and bring them back to her farm.

name: Puzzle Drop Carnival
summary:
More than just another puzzle game. Puzzle Drop Carnival highlights the fun part of puzzle-solving.

Who does not love the good old 'Tetra'-style mechanics? With “Tetra Mode”, the jigsaw is now tetra-saw! Try out Tetra to find out the perfect combination between jigsaw style and 'Tetra'-style games.

name: Pure Blood
summary: "Pure Blood" is an Open World MORPG that tells the story of those who had to flee the invaded kingdom to find their throne again, and you can feel the "taste of hand" of Soul-Like through easy manipulation.

name: Puzzled Hive
summary: Puzzled Hive is a simple, beehive based puzzle game in which you play as Meo and help him explore this strange place in search of his answers.

name: Pug'llector
summary: Pug'llector is a clicker game where you can invest into various upgrades, buy backgrounds and all about collecting a diversity of pugs, you'll get pugs while you play. Become a Pug'llector yourself.

name: Pub Sim
summary: You've just bought your first Pub. First steps are to clean it, stock it, set your markup and let in the Patrons. Keep the drinks flowing and try not to shortchange anyone! If you keep it going long enough you might just earn enough to spruce up the place, hire staff and expand the premises.

name: Pure Golf
summary: This immersive, relaxing 3D golf simulator lets you hone your skills on 6 stunning courses inspired by real-world locations. Set your tee time, choose your tee box, and play in a peaceful sunrise or test your skills in a thrilling thunderstorm! No gimmicks, no microtransactions – just golf.

name: Puzzle Brawl
summary:
Summon epic heroes to battle player defenses in turn based match-3 games.

Challenge players worldwide to match-3 battles. In this epic puzzle RPG, lead your squad of heroes in your quest to be the Brawl Master. Join the fight now!

MATCH 3 PUZZLE BATTLES
You and the enemy take turns solving match 3 puzzles on the same board. Form powerful match 3 combos to smite the enemy heroes or play defensively to deny their most powerful attacks. Make fun tactical tile matches to defeat the enemy in PvP combat.

PvP FIGHTS
Set up the ultimate defense team. Raid other players in versus battles around the world. Steal their trophies by defeating their defending heroes in turn based puzzle battles! Climb to the top of the arena and collect legendary heroes.

EPIC HEROES & SPELLS
Summon over 30+ heroes each with game changing ultimate skills. Disrupt the enemy formation by knocking back enemy tanks. Backstab an enemy hero! Control the tide of battle with fun hero skills! This is a game of strategy and tactics, the best team will emerge victorious!

MODERN PvP REWARD SYSTEM
Collect chests as you win battles, open them while you are idle. Puzzle Brawl is a mashup of traditional match 3 RPG with generous modern PvP games’ reward systems.

TACTICAL FORMATION
Discover unique team ups by placing your heroes in different positions. Form the best attack and defense squads to earn the most trophies! It is an easy to play fun to master game!

DAILY QUESTS
Earn generous rewards through daily quests by playing match-3 battles. Earn a range of loot from Magic to Legendary chests by completing daily puzzle quests.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Form a guild with friends for even more Puzzle Brawling fun! Share strategies, donate cards to help your guildmates, build your own community! Compete with each other to see who is the best Brawl Master!

name: Pudding
summary: This is a game about pudding :)

name: Puzzle Fuzzle
summary:
Sometimes it’s as easy as one and one makes two.
Unlock your inner MacGuyver and your inner Picasso and even your inner engineer as you solve puzzles by disassembling pictures and using the pieces to create a brand new object. Dr Frankenstein is the master of piecing together random parts, but you can do it without all the extra time spent getting a fancy degree. Start creating your mixed-up masterpieces right away!
There are hidden components in each image, your imagination is all you need to combine the correct shapes in the proper way.
Use a suitcase and a mitten to build a toaster.
Find a wine glass in a plunger and a candle.
Your brain is your best tool to see the pieces tucked into each object as you tear apart two distinct images and use the correct parts to make beautiful new pictures.

name: Push & Plunder
summary: An Arcade game where you fire coins at evil statues that hurt you if they fall off the bottom of the board. Complete Challenges, unlock classes, perks, and equipment for your next attempts. Earn Gems & Coins in runs to buy permanent upgrades and unlocks. Can you survive 'til the end?

name: Punch Ball Antonball
summary:
Punch Ball Antonball (later referred to as Punch Ball Antonball Classic) is a platforming video game developed and published by Summitsphere and released on Itch.io. It is the second game in the Anton series. The game is a noticeable shift in gameplay style, resembling the Hudson Soft-developed PC game Punch Ball Mario Bros.

Due to the game's poor quality, Punch Ball Antonball was delisted from Itch.io in December 2021.

The gameplay of Punch Ball Antonball was later iterated on in Antonball Deluxe under an identically-named mode.
